title: Deadly Exchange
description: In this Dateline classic, foreign exchange student Diren Dede’s dream to study in America came true when he started his junior year at a Montana high school. When he takes a midnight walk with a friend, a Saturday night turns into a tragedy. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 30, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
